system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: the user radiates an uplifting power, with the user gaining @Affliction[braced] 1 and @Affliction[harden] 7, and healing 3 Ticks of HP.

Resolution: The user and all allies within range gain +1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 7 activations.
